name: Adhd Arena
description:
Let your ADHD run wild and stack gems to accumulate points, get to higher more rewarding tiers and get the highest score you can by pushing gems around to organize and combine them, get lost in the joys of creating chaos and then putting it to order.

Choose your own playstyle, scores are not affected by playtime, play fast then tidy up, or plan out your placements and keep it organized from the begining, it's up to you.

Some runs can get long, that's why you can quit the game and pick back up where you left last time! no pressures.

Every three months a new season will drop, bringing new game feel/mechanics and shapes to keep it fresh, new rewards for the top 20 players in the global rankings and new content for all players.

Side note: This is the first game I've ever finished, I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I did making it :)
